description:
Taki must pass the entrance exam to be able to play for Deimon. Suzuna tells them Taki has failed to be accepted to every single school with American football in Japan except Deimon. But Taki fails again, and Suzana leaves in frustration. As it turns out, Taki can answer the question --only if it is somehow related to American Football.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アハーハー! ボクデビュー!!
